title: 528. What We're Obsessed With Now
description:
Our staff shares the fabric, products, patterns, and trends we're loving right now. We also share tips for choosing batting, a pattern that's great for your scraps, and chat with Rose Ann Cook of Quilter's Emporium. Quilter's Emporium is known for their connection with customers, charity work, and large selection of fabric and notions.
For more resources from today's show, visit the show notes here: https://www.allpeoplequilt.com/magazines-more/quilting-podcast/episode-528-what-were-obsessed-with-now
Email us at APQPodcast@meredith.com.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
